Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2016 07:12PM Chickadeesylf wrote: me also! 3 spots in right and one in left,,had ultrasound after mammogram. And now waiting for a call from dr. Usually takes a week. So. Just like you I'm also a bit nervous, My breasts feel the let down feeling most of the day and swell up and fill my bra...argggg I'm 51 have had 5 daughters a full hysterectomy. And have been on HRT for 5 years. So. Hmmmmmm. Of course like you I'm glued to the Internet... I keep telling my mind, not to worry. And I do sleep well, I'm tired. More tired the last year and have lost weight and can't gain it , like I used to....so I'm now in the waiting mode,....ill post back when I find out the results. ..fingers crossed and praying. Sylvia in PEI canad
Posts.Title: mammogram found an irregular nodule, very worried. Please help! SkySprite Chickadeesylf

Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2016 07:23PM Chickadeesylf wrote: so sorry to hear! I'm waiting also for results! Try your best to stay positive and upbeat..share your frustration with your closest family and friends, cry and get that release ..know the dr.s will do their utmost best to help..keep a smile on your face, and be the brave trooper! Chin up, and a big bear hug from me! Sylvia from Prince Edward Island Canada""". Found three spots in right breast and one in left.also terrible let down feeling and swelling of breast..hope to know more next week..thinking of you.
